name: 6-Piece Melamine 8.5" Square Salad Plates, Red Reactive

reviews.name: 6-Piece Melamine 8.5" Square Salad Plates, Red Reactive
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something a little different. The color and shape makes for a brighter meal.
reviews.title: Not just another round

reviews.name: 6-Piece Melamine 8.5" Square Salad Plates, Red Reactive
reviews.reviewText: I love these plates, they are the perfect size for a small meal. I like the fact that you can put them in the microwave. Easy to clean. I dropped one on the wood floor and it did not break or crack!
reviews.title: love these plates

reviews.name: 6-Piece Melamine 8.5" Square Salad Plates, Red Reactive
reviews.reviewText: I Love these dishes. They are very lightweight but they look like stoneware. We purchased the whole set and love all of them! Stoneware is just too heavy and Corelle has limited designs. Plus these come in sets of 6 for a better value. Can't say enough good things about them! They stack nicely and take up very little space.
reviews.title: great value

reviews.name: 6-Piece Melamine 8.5" Square Salad Plates, Red Reactive
reviews.reviewText: Enjoying. Just the right size. Needed some durable smaller plates for me and the grandkids.
reviews.title: 6-Piece Melamine 8.5" Square Salad Plates, Red Rea
